alert.note: Alert for George; Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 24 at 4:08AM CDT until August 24 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR STONE...GEORGE...AND PERRY COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI TODAY GIVEN THE COMBINATION OF HOT TEMPERATURES...HIGH KBDI VALUES...AND SIGNIFICANT DROUGHT CONDITIONS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STONE, GEORGE, AND PERRY COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 075, 078 and 079. * WINDS...Southeast 5 to 10 mph this afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as around 30 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
